name: Secrets Of the Cursed Mountain - WIP
name_original: Secrets Of the Cursed Mountain - WIP
description:
A work in progress made in one month for the XV Metroidvania Jam.

Controls:

SPACE -> JUMP

Z/CLICK -> ATTACK
